data.correct_fact: Banksy is known for his street art and graffiti, not detailed oil paintings.

data.question: Is Vincent van Gogh the artist behind Starry Night?
data.correct_fact: Vincent van Gogh painted Starry Night.

data.question: Is Pablo Picasso one of the founders of Cubism?
data.correct_fact: Pablo Picasso is recognized as one of the founders of Cubism.

data.question: Was the artwork The Persistence of Memory created by Salvador Dalí?
data.correct_fact: The Persistence of Memory was painted by Salvador Dalí.

data.question: Was Vincent van Gogh a Dutch painter known for his post-impressionist works?
data.correct_fact: Vincent van Gogh was a Dutch painter known for his post-impressionist works.
